The image freezes after exiting map mode, but I can still control my rocket and switch to map mode and back. In other words, I can't see the rocket because of the frozen image. Sometimes it is a black screen, sometimes a white screen. In this case, all interface elements are active.

Some words may be spelled incorrectly because I am using Google translater.
